snippet: An except from Nate Silver's forthcoming book, "The Signal and the Noise," takes a comprehensive look at prediction across 13 fields, ranging from sports betting to earthquake forecasting and asks: What makes predictions succeed or fail?
abstract: An except from Nate Silver's forthcoming book, "The Signal and the Noise," takes a comprehensive look at prediction across 13 fields, ranging from sports betting to earthquake forecasting and asks: What makes predictions succeed or fail?

headline.main: Why Weather Forecasters Are Role Models

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Signal and the Noise: Why So Many Predictions Fail-but Some Don't (Book)
